member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_URLACL_QUERY
member.summary: TheHTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_URLACL_QUERY structure is used to specify a particular reservation record to query in the URL namespace reservation store. It is passed to the function using the pInputConfigInfo parameter when the ConfigId parameter is equal to HttpServiceConfigUrlAclInfo.

summary.para: One of the following values from the enumeration.
Returns a sequence of records in a sequence of calls, controlled by the dwToken parameter.
If the QueryDesc parameter is equal to HttpServiceConfigQueryExact, then KeyDesc should contain an structure that identifies the reservation record queried.
If the QueryDesc parameter is equal to HttpServiceConfigQueryNext, KeyDesc is ignored.

If the QueryDesc parameter is equal to HttpServiceConfigQueryNext, then dwToken must be equal to zero on the first call to the function, one on the second call, two on the third call, and so forth until all reservation records are returned, at which pointHttpQueryServiceConfiguration returns ERROR_NO_MORE_ITEMS.
If the QueryDesc parameter is equal to HttpServiceConfigQueryExact, then dwToken is ignored.
